title: Question 90:
description: Where can I buy sUSD to fix my C-ratio?

fields.title: Answer
fields.value:
There are several places you can buy sUSD, for example if you need some to burn in Mintr to fix your C-ratio.

You can buy with ETH at:
dex:
[1inch.exchange](https://1inch.exchange/#/ETH/sUSD)
[Uniswap](https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?outputCurrency=0x57ab1ec28d129707052df4df418d58a2d46d5f51)
[Balancer](https://balancer.exchange/#/swap/0x57ab1ec28d129707052df4df418d58a2d46d5f51)
[Mooniswap][https://mooniswap.exchange/#/swap?outputCurrency=0x57ab1ec28d129707052df4df418d58a2d46d5f51)
cex:
[Kucoin](https://www.kucoin.com/trade/SUSD-ETH?rcode=e21sNJ)

You can buy with DAI, USDT, USDC or other stable coins at:
dex:
[Curve Finance](https://www.curve.fi/)
cex: 
[Kucoin](https://www.kucoin.com/trade/SUSD-USDT?rcode=e21sNJ)

You can buy with BTC at:
[Kucoin](https://www.kucoin.com/trade/SUSD-BTC?rcode=e21sNJ)
